macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: HARDFLOWCNTL
macro.description: Hardware serial communication flow control (RTS/CTS), defaults to N.

macro.name: SOFTFLOWCNTL
macro.description: Sotfware serial communication flow control (XON/XOFF) defaults to N.
